data.eml:eml: A revision of the cleptoparasitic bee genus Epeolus Latreille for Nearctic species, north of Mexico (Hymenoptera, Apidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Onuferko, Thomas M. (2018): A revision of the cleptoparasitic bee genus Epeolus Latreille for Nearctic species, north of Mexico (Hymenoptera, Apidae). ZooKeys 755: 1-185, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.755.23939, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.755.23939
